content:
WSFederationElement Class

In this Article

Represents the <wsFederation> element in a configuration file. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class WSFederationElement : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
  • WSFederationElement

Remarks

The <wsFederation> element provides configuration for the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM), which is represented by the WSFederationAuthenticationModule class. The properties of the WSFederationElement class represent the attributes of the <wsFederation> element.

Constructors summary

WSFederationElement()

Initializes a new instance of the WSFederationElement class.

Properties summary

AuthenticationType

Gets or sets the authenticationType attribute.
CustomAttributes

Gets or sets the dictionary that contains any custom attributes.
Freshness

Gets or sets the freshness attribute.
HomeRealm

Gets or sets the homeRealm attribute.
IsConfigured

Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been configured with non-default values.
Issuer

Gets or sets the issuer attribute.
PassiveRedirectEnabled

Gets or sets the passiveRedirectEnabled attribute.
PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects

Gets or sets the persistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects attribute.
Policy

Gets or sets the policy attribute.
Realm

Gets or sets the realm attribute.
Reply

Gets or sets the reply attribute.
Request

Gets or sets the request attribute.
RequestPtr

Gets or sets the requestPtr attribute.
RequireHttps

Gets or sets the requireHttps attribute.
Resource

Gets or sets the resource attribute.
SignInQueryString

Gets or sets the signInQueryString attribute.
SignOutQueryString

Gets or sets the signOutQueryString attribute.
SignOutReply

Gets or sets the signOutReply attribute.

Methods summary

OnDeserializeUnrecognizedAttribute(String,String)

Constructors

  • WSFederationElement()

    Initializes a new instance of the WSFederationElement class.

    public WSFederationElement ();

Properties

  • AuthenticationType

    Gets or sets the authenticationType attribute.

    public string AuthenticationType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains a URI that represents the WS-Federation sign-in request wauth type. The default is an empty string. Optional.

  • CustomAttributes

    Gets or sets the dictionary that contains any custom attributes.

    public System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string,string> CustomAttributes { get; }

    Property Value

    • Dictionary<String,String>

      The dictionary that contains the custom attributes, keyed by attribute name.

  • Freshness

    Gets or sets the freshness attribute.

    public string Freshness { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The required freshness. Sets the WS-Federation sign-in request wfresh parameter. Optional.

  • HomeRealm

    Gets or sets the homeRealm attribute.

    public string HomeRealm { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URI of the home realm of the identity provider (IP). The default is an empty string. Sets the WS-Federation sign-in request whr parameter. Optional.

  • IsConfigured

    Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been configured with non-default values.

    public bool IsConfigured { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the element has been configured with non-default values; otherwise, false.

  • Issuer

    Gets or sets the issuer attribute.

    public string Issuer { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URI of the token issuer. The default is an empty string. Required.

  • PassiveRedirectEnabled

    Gets or sets the passiveRedirectEnabled attribute.

    public bool PassiveRedirectEnabled { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to enable the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) to automatically redirect unauthorized requests to an STS; otherwise, false. The default is true, unauthorized requests are automatically redirected. Optional.

  • PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects

    Gets or sets the persistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects attribute.

    public bool PersistentCookiesOnPassiveRedirects { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to issue persistent cookies when the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) is enabled to initiate WS-Federation passive protocol redirects; otherwise, false. The default is false, cookies are not issued. Optional.

  • Policy

    Gets or sets the policy attribute.

    public string Policy { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URI of the relevant policy. The default is an empty string. Sets the WS-Federation sign-in request wp parameter. Optional.

  • Realm

    Gets or sets the realm attribute.

    public string Realm { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URI of requesting realm. The default is an empty string. Sets the WS-Federation sign-in request wtrealm parameter. Required.

  • Reply

    Gets or sets the reply attribute.

    public string Reply { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URI of the address to reply to. The default is an empty string. Sets the wreply parameter on a WS-Federation sign-in request. Optional.

  • Request

    Gets or sets the request attribute.

    public string Request { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the token issuance request. The default is an empty string. Sets the WS-Federation sign-in request wreq parameter. Optional.

  • RequestPtr

    Gets or sets the requestPtr attribute.

    public string RequestPtr { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A URL that specifies the location of the token issuance request. The default is an empty string. Sets the WS-Federation sign-in request wreqptr parameter. Optional.

  • RequireHttps

    Gets or sets the requireHttps attribute.

    public bool RequireHttps { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to specify that the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) to only redirect to a secure URL for the STS; otherwise, false. The default is true, the WSFAM only redirects to a secure URL for the STS. Optional.

  • Resource

    Gets or sets the resource attribute.

    public string Resource { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URI of the WS-Federation resource value. The default is an empty string. Sets the request WS-Federation sign-in request wres parameter. Optional.

  • SignInQueryString

    Gets or sets the signInQueryString attribute.

    public string SignInQueryString { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Any application defined parameters for the WS-Federation sign-in request URL. The default is an empty string. Provides an extensibility point to include application defined query parameters in the sign-in request URL. Optional.

  • SignOutQueryString

    Gets or sets the signOutQueryString attribute.

    public string SignOutQueryString { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Any application defined parameters for the WS-Federation sign-out request URL. The default is an empty string. Provides an extensibility point to include application defined query parameters in the sign-out request URL. Optional.

  • SignOutReply

    Gets or sets the signOutReply attribute.

    public string SignOutReply { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A string that contains the URL to return to following sign out. Sets the wreply parameter on a WS-Federation sign-out request. Optional.

Methods

  • OnDeserializeUnrecognizedAttribute(String,String)
    protected override bool OnDeserializeUnrecognizedAttribute (string name, string value);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      To be added.

    • value
      String

      To be added.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      To be added.
